comment._content: The Earl was Chairman of the Executive Committee of the AngloAmerican Exposition, seen elsewhere in this stream Title should read Earl Kintore Algernon Keith-Falconer, 9th Earl of Kintore en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Algernon_Keith-Falconer,_9th_Earl_o... Mr Kiralfy, a famous producer, has a great memorial building www.grahamowen.com/Adirondacks_2006-Imre-Kiralfy.html
